wikipedia_page.main: Karl Carver (born 26 March 1996) is an English first-class cricketer. A left-handed batsman and slow left arm orthodox bowler, Carver was previously contracted to Yorkshire County Cricket Club, for whom he played his debut first-class match in 2014. In July 2021, Carver signed with Warwickshire to play for the side for three weeks during the 2021 Royal London One-Day Cup.

response: # On 23 July 2017, Worcestershire's Whiteley hit six sixes off six legal deliveries plus one wide to take the total number of runs in that over to 37 off bowler Karl Carver of Yorkshire at Headingley during a NatWest T20 Blast match.
